title: Truth Blue LF Mid
body:
Hey there, Truth Blue are looking for a new mid laner. Must be available for scrims and practices.

Comment on here your best champions and what you think you can bring to the team.

replies.body: Im Gold 2, highest was PLAT 4 but decayed, but im back! I play Ori, Syndra, Talon. Anyone honestly. Hope you consider it.

Syndra, Orianna, Cass and fizz are my best midlaners and I am a very good macro-game shot caller. IGN: Syouran (I dont main mid but I can play any role besides adc, got to diamond 5 solo/ plat 5 flex playing mid/jungle)
